channel.title: Emote Looping? [Delta]

item.title: Emote Looping? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

So the animation for when you use a spade was messed up on my server so i found the correct emote id for digging and replaced the old one. Problem is once the player starts digging it loops the emote and won’t stop. You can’t even move anywhere, the only way to stop it from looping is logging out or teleporting. If anyone knows how to stop an emote from looping that would be very helpful

c.sM("You dig.."); c.setAnimation(831); break;

Read full topic
